DOC.brief_summary: Apply the information of NAT2 genotyping into the re-challenge protocol of INH titration in patients with anti-TB medication induced hepatitis.
DOC.brief_title: NAT2 in Re-challenge of INH in Patients With Hepatitis
DOC.detailed_description: adjusting INH dose according to NAT2 genotyping and serum concentration of INH.
DOC.criteria: Older than 18 yearsold Taken INH for more than 1 week Abnormal liver function Exclusion criteria: Rule out the INH induced liver abnormality Existing reasons to cause liver abnormality other than TBmedication Taking drugs which interact with INH
